forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds, the atmosphere in Downtown San Francisco reveals a blend of fleeting sunlight and the looming presence of a comforting marine layer. The temperature, hovering gently around sixty degrees, allows for a pleasant respite, despite the brisk west southwest winds whispering across the bay. The visibility is somewhat muted; while the iconic outline of the Golden Gate Bridge remains discernible, it is shrouded in a delicate veil of clouds that hints at the adventures of the day yet looming in the warmth of the evening.

Even as the sun prepares to dip below the horizon, it offers no guarantee of clear skies tonight. Instead, the clouds will thicken, ushering in the evening hours with a soft embrace. It may be wise to don a light jacket or wrap, as temperatures settle into the low fiftys, and winds subtly dance between ten and 17 mph, accompanied by gentle gusts. Perhaps a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero with a warm coffee in hand would suit the mood, allowing for quiet reflections against the backdrop of a lightly obscured skyline. The essence of the day calls for casual warmth and a sense of ease, blending into the ethereal quality that only San Francisco can provide.
